title: Stylized Crystal Ogre
description: Stylized Crystal Ogre monster with several texture options
longDescription:
In the project, 2 rig!.

dummy skeleton for ue 4

Â skeleton for ue 5 manny quinn skeleton

Also, for convenience, I duplicated the animations for both skeletons

also in project 3 recruitment of unique textures

recruitment of animation;

7x attack

2x idle

1x Jump

1x rage

1x reakt

2x run

2x Walk

1x Walk back

1x Walk Left

1x Walk Right
